thread.title: Coronation Street to host UK’s biggest sleep-out
thread.title_full: Coronation Street to host UK’s biggest sleep-out | Granada - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Coronation Street to host UK’s biggest sleep-out
text:
More than 170 experts from businesses across Manchester and the North West will be bedding down on the famous cobbles of Coronation Street in a bid to raise vital funds for youth services.
Byte Night, the UK’s largest sleep-out, will take place at ‘Coronation Street The Tour’ today to raise money for youth services run by Action for Children. Companies including RBS, IBM, La Fosse, Bidvest Logistics, Civica, TalkTalk, CGI, Symantec and Fourth Day PR will bed down for the night to help vulnerable young people across the North West have a safe and loving place to call home.
Simultaneous events will take place in London, Belfast, Edinburgh, Cambridge, Reading, Bristol and Birmingham, with over 1,400 people sleeping out across the UK.
Action for Children hopes Byte Night will raise more than £1.3million to support its work with vulnerable children, young people and families.
David Roots, managing director at Civica UK Limited and co-chair of the Byte Night North West committee, said: “Byte Night North West is now in its third year and sleeping on the cobbles will make it a night to remember."
Last updated Fri 2 Oct 2015 Entertainment Coronation Street
